definitions.definition: Inclined or having a propensity to love , or to sexual enjoyment .
examples: We were both feeling amorous so the inevitable happened.
She kept making these amorous suggestions.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to, or produced by, love.
examples: She read me an amorous poem.

definitions.definition: Affected with love; in love; enamored .
examples: He had been amorous of her since schooldays.

main_definition: Inclined or having a propensity to love , or to sexual enjoyment .
secondary_definitions: Of or relating to, or produced by, love.
( dated ) Affected with love; in love; enamored .
